g:HTMLPanel.g:Label: Packaged: June 1, 2017 or later
URL: categoricaldata.net/aql.html
Name: Categorical Data IDE
Copyright: Patrick Schultz, David Spivak, and Ryan Wisnesky
Version: alpha-snapshot
Help:
For available AQL options and general IDE display options, use the Options button in the main IDE window.
AQL homepage: http://categoricaldata.net/aql.html
AQL manual (contains a detailed description of AQL syntax, options, and behavior): http://categoricaldata.net/aqlmanual.pdf
AQL tutorial: http://categoricaldata.net/tutorial.html
CI homepage: http://catinf.com
